dcterms:description: A diagnostic dataset for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, containing 100K 3D-rendered images and about one million automatically-generated questions that require various kinds of reasoning.
dcterms:title: CLEVR

dcterms:creator: J. Johnson
B. Hariharan
L. van der Maaten
J. Hoffman
L. Fei-Fei
C. Lawrence Zitnick
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: A dataset containing human-posed questions on CLEVR images, making it more complex and realistic for visual question answering tasks.
dcterms:title: CLEVR-Humans
